file_content.text: Like I said, she's all yours. Just don't go getting her in a wreck or anything.
I didn't like the look of your scruffy friend. The big one wearing a droid's head. But he knows his way around a bargain.
She's all yours, my speeder. I know every scratch on that bird. Better not find any new ones. You set to go?
[Start Veteran Mode]
[Start Master Mode]
[Start Hard Mode]
[Refuse Mission]
[You must wait a while before repeating this difficulty mode. Return later.]
[You are not yet eligible for this difficulty mode.]
Whatever you say. I'm here when you're ready.
Not renting my ship out just now, if that's what you're after. But everything's negotiable, given the right price and occasion....
